title.label: I love this game, but I seem to have a major problem!!

content.label: This game is amazing, with a wonderful story, graphics, and more. Although, ever since I wanted to create a new game the screen goes dark when I hit play. The narrator talks but I can‚Äôt see nothing and when it‚Äôs done it just stays blank with no audio. What should I do?

title.label: Game wont load past the title screen

content.label: Purchased this game for my iPad Pro 12.9. To my disappointment the game does not load passed the title screen. I can hear the narrator but the screen itself is black. I‚Äôve reinstalled the game a dozen times to no avail. If anyone has a solution, could you please share? I‚Äôd love to get refunded for this app
I would like to get my money back because I couldn‚Äôt even play the game all I get is a blank black screen
Should work with my iPhone.  I get a black screen when I get passed the title screen.  Wont work.  I feel like I should get my money back, because Apple says this will work on my iPhone.

I‚Äôve tried everything trying to get this app to run on my 12.9‚Äù 2020 iPad Pro but it just won‚Äôt catch. The first screens work up until you select level of game play then there is a narrative but where there is supposed to be Ana animation to accompany the introduction narrative, there is only a black screen. And it stays black even though I can hear the game has started in the background. I‚Äôve tried installing with no other running apps open. Tried starting the game with no other apps open. Reinstalled the game 4 times, even doing a hard restart after deleting and reinstalling.  It‚Äôs always the same. The game runs fine on my iPhone 7 and I will try it there just to see what it‚Äôs all about. But I paid for app hoping to experience its much talked about graphics on the larger screen that the iPad Pro 12.9‚Äù has to offer. I‚Äôm going to go through the process of requesting a refund. Too bad, I was really looking forward too jumping into this game. Based on its reviews, it‚Äôs awesome. Based in reality, not so much.

I see a lot of people complaining about this too. Once you try to start a game it just plays the audio for the intro cutscene and is just stuck there with no way to continue. This game is amazing, but it is also currently completely broken. I hope the developers can fix this eventually

I had gotten this game because I loved it on console and wanted to see how it played here but all I got was the menu screen and sound but when I started the game it went all black with no control, but the sound still worked.
Cannot advance past first intro scene. It‚Äôs just a black screen with audio and no way to advance.

Yes it‚Äôs a fairly old game but if it doesn‚Äôt work then you should remove it from the App Store. Doesnt work on iPhone 11 iOS 14. Title screen works fine but after you load in the narrative is just a black screen and looped. Wasted 6$ for now and I doubt it‚Äôll be fixed.
5 bucks and can‚Äôt play it. Doesn‚Äôt work on iPhone X or i pad air 3.

First if all this game is awesome I love the combat and everything and the story of how dust tries to recover his memories I haven‚Äôt finished the game but I would like to see a second game with the same characters but you control a different main character but don‚Äôt worry I‚Äôll still be playing this game you don‚Äôt have to make a second game if this but it would be a cool thought üòÅüòÅüòÅüòÅ
This game is not working on iOS 14 and after you choose a difficulty level, will have no video with just the audio in the background. Please fix!
this app doesn‚Äôt work...

The scree goes black and the audio plays but no display. I tried re-installing and now there is no display when starting a new game.

title.label: A heartwarming experience, but better on console.

content.label:
This game is amazing, and I would recommend it to anyone. The controls are fluid and the port to mobile from console is very impressive. Although, like my title says, I think the best way to experience it is on PS4, Switch, or even Steam.

  The voice acting is spot on in my opinion as is the dialogue. Also, FIDGET is amazing, funny, and just a great companion, who has a really good and helpful ability. This game definitely deserves 5 stars, and the experience is worth the price. 

   However, as I mentioned above, I really think putting your money on the game towards the console or PC versions is the way to go. I got the iOS version first, and didn't finish it, but then finished it out on PS4, and I enjoyed it on PS4 much more than on iOS. 

Either way you play it, you're gonna have a good time with this one.
I have just bough the game and its not even letting ,e pass the intro of the game. I‚Äôm not happy with it i want a refund!!

Game never advances past the first cutscene. Just loops with ‚Äúour world has fallen to fade.‚Äù 
This glitch is a bummer, I read great things about this game.
Pls help. Opening cinematic just keeps looping nonstop. Can't skip. Can't get into game. I'm on iPhone X so what's the issue? Pls fix this error! I'll update stars once I can actually play...
Please fix the intro bug.
I‚Äôve been trying to get this game to work on my iPhone XR but the intro just plays in a loop at the very beginning. Please help!
I really love the game but if it was longer it would be even bettet
I started playing this game and the beginning cutscene is messed up and nothing will work please can you guys do something about that

This was a great game and well worth the price. It combined some of my favorite genres together. My only minor complaint is the platforming is a little harder because the touchscreen is not as good as a regular directional pad. Luckily there were not too many platforming parts.

title.label: Freezes on first cut scene. Unable to play

content.label: Title says it all. The first cut scene plays 15 seconds.  Then loops.  I am completely unable to play.  No help from developer.  Save your money.  Attempted on iPhone X

I‚Äôve tried restarting the game at least 10 times and have yet to find a way around it. Would love my money back if the developer isn‚Äôt planning on fixing this/updating the game.

That‚Äôs all I get. The game won‚Äôt load. Just plays the first few seconds of the intro video on repeat.
Was excited to play this but It‚Äôs just playing the opening video on repeatüôÅNo way I can tell to bypass it so I‚Äôm unable to play.

title.label: Best game ever! Very beautiful! But glitch found!

content.label:
I love this game. It has amazing art. It‚Äôs fun. It‚Äôs easy and hard. But, I found a glitch!

So, I was playing, and then it showed the chapter 1 thing. And then it did it like three more times. I left the game and it was working again.

Please fix this, but otherwise love the game!

Dust: AET is, when used with a controller, a near console experience. I can dully recommend this game to child and adult alike, but there is one flaw. Support for this game is dodgy, as I had an iPhone 8 plus when I bought this game and it refused to go past the beginning narrative. I did get the new iPhone 11, and now the game works... for some, this will run on there iPhone 8 plus, and for others it won‚Äôt... I don‚Äôt know how that‚Äôs something that is happening, but if you have the newest iPhone, I‚Äôve seen it to work 100% of the time. So so longs it‚Äôs able to run on your iPhone, it‚Äôs a truly flawless experience anyone will enjoy.
Game locks during first cutscene and loops indefinitely making it unplayable.
I'm about 4 hours in on tough difficulty and this is a great game, props to the devs
Cannot pass the intro scene would love to be able to play

title.label: Best game ever needs a sequel^^

content.label: No complaints except I want a sequel where you can play as fidget well she search‚Äôs first dust on an ardeous journey

It is deep and lengthy and satisfying and story-driven and action-packed, with exploration and rpg elements.  A gorgeous, captivating experience.
Good. fun.

title.label: Great graphics, some glitches in gameplay

content.label: I loce the graphics and have fun with the fame but find some of the functionality incompatible with iPhone or iPad.  For instance opening chests is non-responsive.  I would love the game if the controls were better for touchscreen as it has a lot of potential.
I began playing and it wouldn‚Äôt stop doing the beginning over and over again

title.label: The game is 5 stars. The app version is 2.

content.label:
Let me preface by saying I love this game. I played it years ago on PC and loved it. Just amazing. 

The app, however, has big problems. Besides the fact it‚Äôs very uncomfortable and difficult to play (naturally), the dialogue images are weirdly blurred. They‚Äôre like 144p while everything else is HD.  

Worst of all, the cutscenes are glitched!!! Like someone else, the beginning cutscene was looped and out of sync with the audio, making it nearly impossible to play. After restarting a few times I got it to work. 
Now I got to chapter 1, and the graphic saying ‚ÄúCHAPTER 1‚Äù is looping over and over and over and it‚Äôs impossible to skip. My only option is to force quit the app, but I didn‚Äôt save after the boss battle and will have to do it again. 
Your app is a flaming pile of useless garbage if your users have to do this. FIX IT.

(No spoilers) Beautiful world building and characters with a deep and rich story. I was shocked at the ending, it was very heartfelt and unexpected. Not a super long game, but I can tell there was a lot of care that went to making it (longest game I‚Äôve played on an iPad for sure)
Gameplay is pretty good on an iPad but a bit challenging at times (ex: crouching down is difficult as the game has a hard time differentiating finger gestures). Overall a good time and lots to do and see throughout.

title.label: Best Game in App Store Period

content.label: This game is perfect. Great story and quest lines. Well designed gameplay. Worth a replay and another. Strive for perfection in the mini games and challenges if you have the skills. Kind of a cross between Diablo and Sonic the hedgehog. Pure fun. Not some click bait trap game. Worth every penny and more!
I just downloaded the game, the intro is stuck on a never ending loop! I tried deleting and reinstalling it, doesn‚Äôt work. Please fix!

I got this game even though I was iffy about it. I looked through the reviews and convinced myself to get it. And honestly it‚Äôs one of my favorite short story games. I couldn‚Äôt put down my phone. The story kept ahold of me and the sidequests were a nice add on. The battle aspect is nice and though it‚Äôs simple, it‚Äôs fun. It‚Äôs an emotional game, that‚Äôs for sure. I loved all parts of this game and it was worth every penny.

Simply a masterpiece. The art, story, action, and music combine to make a near perfect game. The world and voice acting is so immersive I can‚Äôt believe something like this exists on the app store. 11/10 would buy again and again.
As I said before perfection!

Great voice acting, beautiful music, nicely drawn and animated characters. Overall story is a little bit childish and silly, plus some of the characters are a little too Disney-ish. Plus you get powerful very quick in the game, and the difficulty never really catches quite up to how it is in the first 1-2 hours because you‚Äôre so powerful. Still, you manage to die here and there, and it‚Äôs a good time beating up all the villains. Plus the voice of your sidekick is adorable. Overall, a nice fun innocent polished game. Keep in mind that those combos rely heavily on timing, and are quite fun once you get good at them! 5 stars.

title.label: Sad ending but good game also plz make a sequel where dust comes back

content.label: I‚Äôd love a sequel to this game. This is by far the cutest game that has combat abilities as well as some cute characters and some cool characters and I really hope if you do make the sequel dust is back kinda like a respawn thing where he has all his memories from the first game and id like it if it‚Äôs the same price as this game it doesn‚Äôt have to be tho. This games ending tho it didn‚Äôt make me cry for some odd reason it still made me sad to know that dust died but the rest after the end of the fighting place you see this glowing thing flying somewhere and I was wondering was that dust being spawned again?

They perfectly captured the game on mobile, with many ways to customize the controls this has to be one of the best versions of dust.

On a greater scale, the game dust has an amazing story for casual and and pros alike.
